name: Dim Level
description: Dims the screen while playing a level.

enable-overlay.name: Enable Dim Overlay
enable-overlay.description: Enables the overlay that dims the screen.

set-opacity.name: Set Opacity (%)
set-opacity.description: Sets the dimness of the screen.

overlay-color.name: Overlay Color
overlay-color.description: Sets the color of the screen overlay.

show-opacity-button.name: Show Settings Button
show-opacity-button.description: Shows the mod settings button in the pause menu settings.
